este.thirdparty.react

React is Facebook UI library.

It's usefull to make non destructive HTML updates. If you don't care about DOM state you should use Closure Templates with element's innerHTML, which is still the fastest approach.

Remember to use externs for advanced compilation. Take a loot at:
github.com/steida/este-library/blob/master/externs/react/react-3.3.js
github.com/steida/este/blob/master/Gruntfile.coffee
